783:2: 1 | samādhiḥ apramāṇāni abhijñāḥ kṛtsnāyatanāni abhibhvāyatanāni vimokṣāś(ceti)dhyānāni ||
783:6: samāhitaḥ paśyati paṃcopādānaskaṃdhāḥ śūnyāḥ anātmānaḥ anātmīyā iti |
783:8: samādhimimamavatīrṇo na praṇidadhāti rāgadveṣamohān punarutpattimata ityapraṇihitasamādhiḥ |
783:12: rūpādayaḥ paṃca viṣayāḥ puruṣaḥ strī jātirjarā'nityatā |
783:24: samāhito bhāvayati sarve tridhātusattvāḥ vayaṃ śātrvādyāśca na bhinnā iti |
783:25: vijahātyāntarikadveṣamiti maitrī nāmāpramāṇaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasaṃprayuktaṃ samyagvācaḥ samyakkarmāntasyotthāpakamapi na sarvasaṃskārasaṃprayuktamiti maitryapramāṇaṃ ||
783:28: vāhyakleśān vyapanetuṃ pratibalo bhavatīti karuṇā nāmāpramāṇaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasaṃprayuktaṃ samyagvācaḥ samyakkarmāntasyotthāpakamapi na sarva saṃskārasaṃprayuktamiti karuṇāpramāṇaṃ ||
783:31: iti prāptasukhasaumanasyo duḥkhadaurmanasyāpanayanapratibalo bhavatīti muditā nāmāpramāṇaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasaṃprayuktaṃsamyagvācaḥ samyakkarmāntasyotthāpakamapi na sarvasaṃskārasaṃprayuktamiti muditāpramāṇaṃ ||
783:32: samāhito bhāvayati tridhātusattvāḥ sukhaduḥkhamodaudāsīnyabhāja iti rāgadveṣāpanayanāya pratibalo bhavatītyupekṣānāmāpramāṇaṃ vedanasaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasaṃprayuktaṃ samyagvācaḥ samyakkarmāntasyotthāpakamapi na sarvasaṃskārasaṃprayuktaṃ ||
783:34: ṛddhipādaḥ divyacakṣuḥ divyaśrotraṃ pūrvanivāsavijñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ āsravakṣayajñānaṃ ca |
783:49: nityaṃ paśyati kāyaṃ śūnyaṃ śikṣate laghūtthānamityetena mārgeṇa (utpatanarūpāṃ)
783:57: pṛthagjanānāṃ nirmāṇaṃ bhavati saptadināni yāvat anatikramya saptadināni niruddhyati |
783:58: buddhānāṃ buddhātmajānāṃ vaśe vartate nirmāṇaṃ nirmāṇakālaśca |
783:59: paśyan lokaṃ śucimaśucimivāśuciṃ śucimiva vihāya śucyaśucyanusmṛtimupekṣāsmṛticitto bhavatītyāryapudgalābhijñā |
783:66: antike paśyati sarvaṃ sūkṣmarūpaṃ sūryācandramasau tārā agniṃ maṇimityeṣa mārgo (yena)
783:70: śrṛṇoti vijānāti buddhyati ca vividhān divyān mānuṣān nārakān pretatiryagjān śabdānityeṣa mārgo (yena)
783:73: smarati pūrvalokavṛttaṃ yasmādagato yasmiṃśca deśe samutpannaḥ - ityeṣa mārgo (yena)
783:76: nityamanusmarati pareṣāṃ kliṣṭacittaṃ pareṣāṃ paryavadātacittaṃ sarvaṃ jānāti svacittotpādanirodhaṃ pratibalo bhavati vivicya parijñātumityeṣa mārgo (yena)
783:89: manasi karoti kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivīṃ nānyat manasi karoti |
783:99: ālaṃbanaṃpaśyan parivartayati cittaṃ prāpnoti vimuktimiti vimokṣaḥ |
783:105: vibhajya paśyatyadhyātmaṃbahirdhā ca rūpaṃ sarvaṃ śucirūpamiti tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ |
783:108: 8 | adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā paśyati rūpāṇi parittāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni |
783:110: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā paśyati rūpāṇi apramāṇāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni |
783:112: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā paśyati rūpāṇi parittāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni |
783:114: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhāpaśyati rūpāṇi apramāṇāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni |
783:121: adhyātmamanabhibhūtarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā śuddhāni parittāni rūpāṇi paśyatīti prathamamapramāṇāyatanaṃ dvitīyaṃ |
783:122: adhyātmamabhibhūtarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā śuddhāni parittāni rūpāṇi paśyatīti tṛtīyamapramāṇāyatanaṃ |
783:131: maitrī karuṇā muditā ceti tisraḥ paṃcābhijñāśca mauleṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu vidyante |
783:132: ṣaḍbhūmiṣu dharmajñānaṃ vidyate asamāpattidhyāneṣu madhyamadhyāneṣu maulacaturdhyāneṣu |
783:133: muditā prathamā dvitīyā ca vimuktiḥ ādyāni catvāryabhibhvāyatanāni prathamadhyāne dvitīyadhyāne ca vidyante |
783:134: aparāṇyabhibhvāyatanāni śubhavimokṣaśca aṣṭau kṛtsnāyatanāni ca caturthadhyāne vidyante |
783:135: aparau vimokṣau dve kṛtsnāyatane ca svanāmasaṃgṛhītāni |
783:137: trayaḥ samādhayaḥ saptajñānāni anāsravābhijñā ca navabhūmisaṃgṛhītāni |
783:143: trayo vimokṣāḥ aṣṭāvabhibhvāyatanāni daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni sāsravāṇi |
783:144: bhavāgre sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ mandaṃ na tīkṣṇamiti sa (bhavāgraḥ)sāsravaḥ |
783:158: anāsravamārgamāśritya mauladhyānabhūmikaḥ svabhūmikamūrdhvabhūmikaṃ cāpi jahāti rāgaṃ |
783:160: tena pṛthagjano bhavāgre na rāgaprahāṇapratibalo bhavati |
783:168: buddhātmajo jahāti cetkāmarāgaṃ āśrayati cāsamāpattidhyānabhūmiṃ pratyutpannādhvani bhāvayati sāsravamārgaṃ anāgate bhāvayati sāsravānāsravamārge navamavimokṣamārge pratyutpanne bhāvayati sāsravamārgaṃ anāgate bhāvayati sāsravānāsravaṃ ||
783:169: prathamadhyānikaḥ bhāvitānāsravāsamāpattidhyānikaḥ āsrayati ced asamāpattidhyānaṃ pratyutpanne bhāvayatyanāsravamārgaṃ anāgate bhāvayati sāsravānāsravamārgaṃ navamavimokṣamārge pratyutpannādhvani bhāvayatyanāsravamārgaṃ anāgate bhāvayati sāsravānānāsravamārgaṃ ||
783:170: prathamadhyāniko buddhātmajo jahāti cetprathamadhyānarāgaṃ āśrayati asamāpatti (=anāgamya)
783:171: dvitīyadhyānabhūmiṃ pratyutpannādhvani bhāvayati sāsravamārgaṃ anāgate bhāvayati sāsravānāsravamārgaṃ navamavimokṣamārge pratyutpannādhvani bhāvayati sāsravamārgaṃ anāgate bhāvayati anāsravaṃ ||
783:179: 15 | bhavāgre rāgaprahāṇakāle bhāvayati sarvānāsravadhyānāni navamavimokṣamārge pratyupannādhvani bhāvayatyanāsravamārgaṃ anāgate bhāvayatyanāsravaṃ bhāvayati ca tridhātupratisaṃyuktakuśalamūlāni trayoviṃśatividhān samādhīn sāsvādānaṣṭau śuddhānaṣṭau anāsravān sapta (ceti)||
783:194: anāsravaṃ tṛtīyadhyānaṃ caturthadhyānaṃ ākāśānantyāyatanasamādhiśca krameṇa janayanti daśa bhūmīḥ |
783:198: anāsravaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ krameṇa janayati nava bhūmīḥ |
783:208: 18 | āsvādaḥ krameṇa jāyate dvividhaḥ svabhūmikaḥ āsvādaḥ atho'
783:217: sāsvādaḥ ārūpyasamādhiḥ svabhūmyāsvādālaṃbanaḥ śuddha śubhālaṃbanaśca nānāsravālaṃbanaḥ ||
783:218: 19 | catvāryapramāṇāni aṣṭau abhibhvāyatanāni trayo vimokṣāḥ aṣṭau kṛtsnāyatanāni (ceti)
783:227: sa pratibalo labdhumagradhyānaṃ pratibalo dhartumāyuḥ pratibalo hātumāyuḥ praṇidhijñānaḥ cittena yathākāmamakhilaṃ jānātyatītāgatapratyutpannasarvadharmān bhūyo jānātyanāgatadharmān ||
783:230: paracitte nodbhāvayati dveṣamityakopyaṃ caturdhyāneṣu saṃgṛhītaṃ kāmadhātunāpi ca (saṃgṛhyate)||
